content.webTitle: America first, world second: Trump ditches Paris deal | The minute

fields.headline: America first, world second: Trump ditches Paris deal
fields.bodyText: Donald Trump said the US was quitting the Paris climate accord “in order to fulfill my solemn duty to protect America and its citizens.” He described a wacky and seemingly paranoid global conspiracy to harm America by ensnaring it in the deal. Obama condemns Trump I was elected to represent the citizens of Pittsburgh, not Paris. – Donald Trump Nigel Farage is a “person of interest” in the US counter-intelligence investigation that is looking into possible collusion between the Kremlin and Donald Trump’s presidential campaign, the Guardian has been told. Six questions Farage won’t answer Former FBI director James Comey plans to testify before the Senate intelligence committee next Thursday. He is expected to answer questions about whether the president pressured him to end an FBI investigation of Trump associates and Russia. White House mum on Russia It might take just a minute to catch up on the latest politics news. But good journalism takes time and costs money. If you like the Guardian’s politics coverage, please make a contribution. Thanks for reading! Make a contribution today
